siteMetadata.title: OKC and Norman Personal Protective Equipment Squad
siteMetadata.description: Join Norman and OKC volunteers in donating 3D Printed PPE.

node.excerpt: If your health organization (or other high-risk individuals serving the community) could use Personal Protective Equipment, please contact Michael Graff at explorer@flame.org.

Visit the links below to download the .STL files. 3D Printed Face Mask covidmaskcap.stl covidmaskgrid.stl covid_mask.stl Face Shield bottom_reinforcement-RC3.stl faceshield-RC3+b1-stack4.stl faceshield-RC3+b1.stl

This volunteer group was started to help spread useful information on what can be created and used at local health care centers. You can help by joining our efforts to fulfill requests for PPE for medical or other high-risk professionals. 0) Learn…

How can I help? Donation of materials we need. We currently need: PETG (preferred) or PLA, 1.75 mm, no “add-ins” like glitter or similar. Unopened packages preferred. 0.5 mm to 1.0mm PETG clear plastic sheets at least 16x10 inches. Other types can be…
